title.rendered: Ribbon Cutting at Sola Salons Rib Mountain 2/29 4pm

content.rendered:
Celebrate 1 year anniversary of new ownership and meet our top notch independent beauty professionals

We are excited to showcase the dedication and hard work of our small business owners at Sola. We want to open our doors and welcome the community to meet these exceptional female business owners.”

— Kristin Kranias

WAUSAU, WI, UNITED STATES, February 26, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — Ribbon Cutting Ceremony Celebrates Anniversary for Sola Salons in Wausau Rib Mountain

Sola Salons in Rib Mountain of Wausau, Wisconsin is thrilled to announce a special ribbon-cutting ceremony with the Wausau Chamber of Commerce. The event will take place on Thursday, February 29, 2024 at 4pm Sola Salons’ location in Rib Mountain.

The event will commemorate the 1-year anniversary of new ownership as well as introduce and celebrate all of the amazing Salon Owners who operate their independent businesses from the space. Sola Salons is the largest luxury salon studios business in the country with over 20,000 independent beauty professionals and 700+ locations. Each of our beauty professionals is an entrepreneur who runs their own business from within Sola Salons. In our Wausau location, we have best-in-class hair stylists, estheticians, teeth whitening and even a new boutique!

“We are excited to mark this special occasion and showcase the dedication and hard work of our small business owners at Sola. Each of our salon owners is top notch in their field and committed to providing high end services to the Rib Mountain Wausau community,” said Kristin Kranias, new owner of the Sola Salons. “The location has been here for a few years, but many people are not entirely sure of what it is – we want to open our doors and welcome the community to meet these exceptional female business owners.”

Guests will have the opportunity to tour the salon, meet the talented individual salon owners and learn more about their services. Members of the media and the public are invited to attend. Light food and refreshments will be served. Don’t miss out on this exciting event.

Event Details

What: Ribbon Cutting Ceremony at Sola Salons in Wausau, WI

Location: 226820 Rib Mountain Dr, Wausau, WI 54401

Date: Thursday, February 29, 2024

Time: 4-4:30pm

Light food and refreshments will be served. Come meet the independent Salon and Boutique Owners at Sola Salons in Rib Mountain.

For media inquiries, please contact:

Kristin Kranias, 920-326-1870

About Sola Salons:

We provide beauty professionals with high-end, fully equipped private salon studios alongside the support and tools needed to launch your business in no time.

We take pride in being the largest, fastest-growing salon studio business with a thriving community of over 20,000 industry-leading beauty professionals and 700+ locations nationwide.

We provide a safe, inclusive space with unmatched support so our Sola pros can thrive. We have one goal in mind: to set you up for success.

Kristin Kranias
Sola Salons Rib Mountain
+1 920-326-1870
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Instagram

You just read:

News Provided By

February 26, 2024, 19:50 GMT
